title: INTERGENERATIONAL FUN RUN/WALK
details: INTERGENERATIONAL FUN RUN/WALK 17th SEPTEMBER 2022 The  Intergenerational walk or run was planned for all ages from different Community groups or Faith to come together to help the organisation to raise the issues around Asthma and allergy. It was a lovely day....

title: Charity Run Sep 2022
details: INTERGENERATIONAL FUN RUN AND WALK round the Sefton Park on the 17th of September 2022 from 10am. A fund raising event for patients with chronic Asthma at UK and Nigeria with support from Soroptimists International Liverpool. ALL AGES ARE WELCOME BUT CHILDREN....

title: RE-ACTIVITIES JULY 2022
details: Two Teaching Hospitals our current partners were visited in July 2022. We met some patients at the Obafemi Awolowo University Teaching Hospital IleIfe and University College Hospital Ibadan. We also managed to meet our partners at the Asthma Chest Care Foundation. All...

title: Non-Profit
details: The Foundation is a non-profit organisation dedicated to improve the lives of people with Asthma and Allergies. Every penny you can donate goes towards help suffering people.
